long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Coil Online is a simple and fun game right on the chrome extension. How to play is simple by holding the left mouse button and dragging the colored points until they explode and win high if you have a short time but win a lot of points.
